title: How to see VR on a single screen when the screen is split - Quora

response.answer_text: i suppose you want to know how you can watch the 360/VR videos on your phone. When you click the the (View in VR) button displayed on any video.  the phone screen view splits into two like the following image  To view this as a VR video you need a basic cardboard headset to view it in.   And there are many options for phone headset devices available today with better quality lens for better VR experience.
